statements: SELECT * FROM library_books;
SELECT book_title, author FROM library_books WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM library_books WHERE author = 'Stephen King';
SELECT id, book_title, publication_year FROM library_books ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT id, book_title, author, quantity FROM library_books WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM library_books WHERE author = 'John Smith' AND publication_year > 2010 ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT book_title, author, quantity FROM library_books WHERE availability = true ORDER BY author ASC, publication_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM library_books WHERE quantity > 10 AND availability = true ORDER BY quantity DESC, publication_year ASC;
SELECT book_title, author, publication_year FROM library_books WHERE publication_year IS NOT NULL ORDER BY publication_year ASC, author DESC;
SELECT id, book_title, author, availability FROM library_books WHERE author <> 'Mary Johnson' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM library_books WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT title, author FROM library_books WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT title, author, genre FROM library_books WHERE quantity < 10 AND genre = 'Fiction';
SELECT id, title, author FROM library_books ORDER BY title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM circulation_records WHERE checkout_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, author, genre FROM library_books WHERE genre='Mystery';
SELECT * FROM library_books ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT author, COUNT(id) AS 'Total Books' FROM library_books GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM library_books WHERE quantity > 0 AND genre='Fiction' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT circulation_records.record_id, library_books.title, circulation_records.checkout_date FROM circulation_records LEFT JOIN library_books ON circulation_records.book_id=library_books.id;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE availability = True;
SELECT title, author, isbn FROM books WHERE author = 'J.K. Rowling';
SELECT loan_date, return_date FROM loans WHERE book_id = 1;
SELECT borrower_name, email, phone_number FROM borrowers;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE author LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY book_id DESC;
SELECT b.borrower_id, b.borrower_name, l.loan_date FROM borrowers b LEFT JOIN loans l ON b.borrower_id = l.borrower_id;
SELECT b.borrower_name, COUNT(l.book_id) AS number_of_loans FROM borrowers b INNER JOIN loans l ON b.borrower_id = l.borrower_id GROUP BY b.borrower_name;

SELECT b.borrower_name, l.loan_date, lb.title AS borrowed_book FROM borrowers b INNER JOIN loans l ON b.borrower_id = l.borrower_id INNER JOIN books lb ON l.book_id = lb.book_id WHERE l.return_date IS NULL ORDER BY l.loan_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM books;
SELECT title, author FROM books WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT title, author, category FROM books WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT author_name FROM authors ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM circulation_records WHERE return_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE publication_year > 2000;
SELECT title, author, publication_year FROM books ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT title, author FROM books INNER JOIN authors ON books.author = authors.author_name WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, author, checkout_date FROM books INNER JOIN circulation_records ON books.book_id = circulation_records.book_id;
SELECT * FROM BookInventory;
SELECT title, author FROM BookInventory WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT * FROM BookCopies ORDER BY library_id DESC;
SELECT title, publish_date FROM BookInventory WHERE genre = 'Fantasy' LIMIT 3;
SELECT borrower_id, name, email FROM Borrowers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM BookInventory WHERE genre = 'Mystery';
SELECT title, author FROM BookInventory ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BookCopies WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY library_id, copy_id;
SELECT b.title, b.author, br.name AS library_name FROM BookInventory b JOIN BookCopies bc ON b.book_id = bc.book_id JOIN LibraryBranches br ON bc.library_id = br.library_id;

SELECT br.name AS library_name, COUNT(cr.record_id) AS total_checkouts FROM LibraryBranches br LEFT JOIN BookCopies bc ON br.library_id = bc.library_id LEFT JOIN CirculationRecords cr ON bc.copy_id = cr.copy_id GROUP BY br.name ORDER BY total_checkouts DESC;
